item.title: DACS Episodes
item.description: Designers Against Child Slavery is a Design Collective that enables creatives from all over the world to rise up against the child sex trade. We want to see just how effective artists can be when they start breaking the boundaries of Culture, race, religion, and backgrounds to unite for a just cause, and use their unique styles and talents to give a voice to the voiceless. We are a group of Artists with a passion for making a difference in the world. We leverage our unique gifts and styles to produce artwork, with the intentions of raise awareness about the child sex trade and inspiring others to find a way to use their talents to impact with world.
item.content:encoded: Designers Against Child Slavery is a Design Collective that enables creatives from all over the world to rise up against the child sex trade. We want to see just how effective artists can be when they start breaking the boundaries of Culture, race, religion, and backgrounds to unite for a just cause, and use their unique styles and talents to give a voice to the voiceless. We are a group of Artists with a passion for making a difference in the world. We leverage our unique gifts and styles to produce artwork, with the intentions of raise awareness about the child sex trade and inspiring others to find a way to use their talents to impact with world.

item.title: Norheim
item.description: Norheim er en egen merkevare for Gresvig, solgt gjennom G-Sport butikkene. Trenden i retning av mer tekniske klær hadde påvirket salget av Norheim-produktene. Norheim er en fantastisk merkevare, men hadde ikke fulgt med i timen. Det var nødvendig for oss å legge større ressurser i designet av kolleksjonene. Vi måtte revitalisere Norheim for å gjøre det mer tiltalende for dagens frilufts entusiaster, kommenterer Kjetil Løken, markedssjef i Gresvig. - Norheim er et merke som står sterkt i norske hjerter. Når vi analyserte merkevaren så vi at det var sterke bånd til det. Alle virket til å ha gode minner med Norheim fra sin egen oppvekst, kommenterer Gary Swindell, kreativ leder i Mission. Vår utfordring lå i å få frem disse følelsene, samtidig som vi måtte møte kravene som settes til et tidsriktig sports-merke. - Mission moderniserte identiteten med tanke på mangfold og allsidighet. Merkebyggingen vil bli sett på tvers av bekledning, fottøy og utstyr. Dette omfatter bl.a. etiketter, merke-lapper og pakningsdesign. - Vi valgte Mission på grunn av styrken i deres tidligere arbeide for sports-merker, fortsetter Kjetil Løken. Relanseringen av Norheim er et viktig initiativ fra Gresvig sin side, og vi behøvde designere som kunne håndtere våre strategiske og kreative ambisjoner uten å miste synet på merkets historie. Vi har store forventninger til Missions bidrag.
item.content:encoded: Norheim er en egen merkevare for Gresvig, solgt gjennom G-Sport butikkene. Trenden i retning av mer tekniske klær hadde påvirket salget av Norheim-produktene. Norheim er en fantastisk merkevare, men hadde ikke fulgt med i timen. Det var nødvendig for oss å legge større ressurser i designet av kolleksjonene. Vi måtte revitalisere Norheim for å gjøre det mer tiltalende for dagens frilufts entusiaster, kommenterer Kjetil Løken, markedssjef i Gresvig. - Norheim er et merke som står sterkt i norske hjerter. Når vi analyserte merkevaren så vi at det var sterke bånd til det. Alle virket til å ha gode minner med Norheim fra sin egen oppvekst, kommenterer Gary Swindell, kreativ leder i Mission. Vår utfordring lå i å få frem disse følelsene, samtidig som vi måtte møte kravene som settes til et tidsriktig sports-merke. - Mission moderniserte identiteten med tanke på mangfold og allsidighet. Merkebyggingen vil bli sett på tvers av bekledning, fottøy og utstyr. Dette omfatter bl.a. etiketter, merke-lapper og pakningsdesign. - Vi valgte Mission på grunn av styrken i deres tidligere arbeide for sports-merker, fortsetter Kjetil Løken. Relanseringen av Norheim er et viktig initiativ fra Gresvig sin side, og vi behøvde designere som kunne håndtere våre strategiske og kreative ambisjoner uten å miste synet på merkets historie. Vi har store forventninger til Missions bidrag.

item.title: DM1 - The Drum Machine
item.description: DM1 is an advanced vintage Drum Machine. It turns your iPad into a fun and creative beat making machine. Easy and fast to use, loaded with 24 superb electronic drum kits and beautiful hyper-realistic graphics, DM1 has been designed for a lot of instant fun. As electronic musicians ourselves, we, at Fingerlab, have developed DM1 with the intention of delivering the perfect mix between fun playability and powerful sonic capacities. We always keep in mind the importance of a beautiful design with the right balance of powerful abilities while avoiding clumsy, overbusy interfaces. Check our 24 electronic drum kits. 12 classic vintage drum kits plus 12 in-house produced electronic kits, edited and mastered at Fingerlab professional studio. DM1 offers 5 main sections: 1 - THE STEP SEQUENCER frees your imagination with a smart use of the multi-touch screen. Just turn on and off steps in your sequence with the tip of your fingers to create cool beats, or unexpected rhythms! 2 - THE DRUM PADS simply lets you play and record the beat that tickles your fingers. No need to be a first-class drummer, automatic quantize does the work for you. 3 - THE MIXER for quick and subtle sound mixing of your drum kits. Featuring settings for volume, pitch, sample length, custom drum kit element for each channel, mute and solo mode. 4 - THE FX TRACKPADS a creative duo of FX trackpads to distort, modulate and transform your beats. The effects include: Phaser, Overdrive, Delay, Texturizer* and Robotizer* (* for iPad 2 only). 5 - THE SONG COMPOSER allows you to quickly make a song with the beat patterns you have created. Just drag and drop the patterns onto the timeline. Fast and easy. Specifications: ? Graphic design by Jonas Eriksson ? Smart ergonomy for fast creativity and fun ? 24 vintage and produced drum kits, mastered at in-house Fingerlab Sound Studios ? Mixer page with pitch, length and level rotary controls, and custom drum kit per channel ? Extra fast drum kit loading ? Playable pattern selection for extra creativity ? 9 Big Drum pads, quantized recording and MPC-like Repeat touch-stripe ? Step Sequencer with multi-touch matrix ? Duo FX Trackpads for real-time sonic destruction and multi-FX ? Mode song with intuitive editing Coming soon: ? More FX ? High-quality export to email or iTunes shared folder Feel free to let us know what you think and what you'd like to see in the next DM1 update. Enjoy!
item.content:encoded: DM1 is an advanced vintage Drum Machine. It turns your iPad into a fun and creative beat making machine. Easy and fast to use, loaded with 24 superb electronic drum kits and beautiful hyper-realistic graphics, DM1 has been designed for a lot of instant fun. As electronic musicians ourselves, we, at Fingerlab, have developed DM1 with the intention of delivering the perfect mix between fun playability and powerful sonic capacities. We always keep in mind the importance of a beautiful design with the right balance of powerful abilities while avoiding clumsy, overbusy interfaces. Check our 24 electronic drum kits. 12 classic vintage drum kits plus 12 in-house produced electronic kits, edited and mastered at Fingerlab professional studio. DM1 offers 5 main sections: 1 - THE STEP SEQUENCER frees your imagination with a smart use of the multi-touch screen. Just turn on and off steps in your sequence with the tip of your fingers to create cool beats, or unexpected rhythms! 2 - THE DRUM PADS simply lets you play and record the beat that tickles your fingers. No need to be a first-class drummer, automatic quantize does the work for you. 3 - THE MIXER for quick and subtle sound mixing of your drum kits. Featuring settings for volume, pitch, sample length, custom drum kit element for each channel, mute and solo mode. 4 - THE FX TRACKPADS a creative duo of FX trackpads to distort, modulate and transform your beats. The effects include: Phaser, Overdrive, Delay, Texturizer* and Robotizer* (* for iPad 2 only). 5 - THE SONG COMPOSER allows you to quickly make a song with the beat patterns you have created. Just drag and drop the patterns onto the timeline. Fast and easy. Specifications: ? Graphic design by Jonas Eriksson ? Smart ergonomy for fast creativity and fun ? 24 vintage and produced drum kits, mastered at in-house Fingerlab Sound Studios ? Mixer page with pitch, length and level rotary controls, and custom drum kit per channel ? Extra fast drum kit loading ? Playable pattern selection for extra creativity ? 9 Big Drum pads, quantized recording and MPC-like Repeat touch-stripe ? Step Sequencer with multi-touch matrix ? Duo FX Trackpads for real-time sonic destruction and multi-FX ? Mode song with intuitive editing Coming soon: ? More FX ? High-quality export to email or iTunes shared folder Feel free to let us know what you think and what you'd like to see in the next DM1 update. Enjoy!

item.title: Track 10 ID
item.description: Track 10 / Logotype and Poster Design Track is an annual student exhibition of Visual Communication Design & Photography and Video Departments in Istanbul Bilgi University. This years themes are pattern, loop and layer. This is a rejected design.

item.title: Am Fleischmarkt 1 - corporate & web design
item.description: On behalf of Amisola Immobilien AG moodley has developed a special communicationand visualization concept for the visionary art nouveau building that was builtin 1909 and is located at Fleischmarkt 1 in the Vienna city center. Incooperation with the Federal Monuments Office the building has been returned toits original glory. Tenants await exclusive work rooms with high-end-equipment,based on a pioneering ecological operational concept. In accordance with thisvery high standard a new graphic identity was developed for one of theaddresses for office space in Vienna. The unique architecture and coloring ofthe historic building inspired the design of all communication measures relatedto the marketing of the building. Logo design, typography, business cards, stationary, floor plans, poster folder, image-book, information box, web design and car branding by moodley brand identity. CREDITS Client: Amisola AG Strategic advice creative art direction: Gerd Schicketanz Graphic design: Katharina Hölzl Text concepts: Michael Endlicher Photography: Andreas Balon, gregortitze.com Production: Alanova Druckerei GmbH Web: muevo (www.fleischmarkt1.at) Product photography: Marion Luttenberger

Tenants await exclusive work rooms with high-end-equipment,based on a pioneering ecological operational concept. In accordance with thisvery high standard a new graphic identity was developed for one of theaddresses for office space in Vienna. The unique architecture and coloring ofthe historic building inspired the design of all communication measures relatedto the marketing of the building. Logo design, typography, business cards, stationary, floor plans, poster folder, image-book, information box, web design and car branding by moodley brand identity.
